title: Masako Hozumi
summary: Masako Hozumi (Japanese: 穂積 雅子; born 11 September 1986, in Fukushima) is a Japanese speed skater from Hokkaido. In 2009, she finished fourth overall at the 2009 Allround. She competed for Japan at the 2010 and 2014 Winter Olympics.She is named after Masako Natsume, a famous Japanese actress.
